name: timezip
description: Simple archive and timestamping tool. Suitable for backup

scripts.build: esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/main.js --platform=node && esbuild src/cli.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/cli.js --platform=node && run-p emitD
scripts.package: run-p clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production run-p build && pkg -t node18-win,node18-macos,node18-linux -o release/timezip dist/cli.js
scripts.test: run-p clean && run-p build-dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node . test/target ../

author: bistalink
